languages.text: "Со дня моего посвящения в аколиты — десятилетия". {n}Хейнрикс пожимает плечом.{/n} "Сколько при этом прошло реальных лет — трудно сказать. Нередко после очередного перелета в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g} оказывалось, что в {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальном мире{/g} прошло намного больше — или намного меньше".

traits.locale_text: "Сразу после завершения моего обучения в Адептус Астра Телепатика я стал инквизиторским аколитом. Сколько это в реальных годах..." {n}Хейнрикс пожимает плечом.{/n} "Десятилетия".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Со дня моего посвящения в аколиты — десятилетия". {n}Хейнрикс пожимает плечом.{/n} "Сколько при этом прошло реальных лет — трудно сказать. Нередко после очередного перелета в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g} оказывалось, что в {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальном мире{/g} прошло намного больше — или намного меньше".

traits.locale_text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey in the Warp, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in the real world."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in the realspace."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey in the Warp, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in the real world."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “自从我成为侍仆的那天起，我就一直侍奉审判庭。也就是说，已经过了几十年了。”{n}海因里希耸了耸肩。{/n}“至于实际上过了多少年，我也说不好。每次我从{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}中回来时，都会发现{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}中时间的流逝与亚空间中大相径庭。”
languages.original_text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “自从我成为侍仆的那天起，我就一直侍奉审判庭。也就是说，已经过了几十年了。”{n}海因里希耸了耸肩。{/n}“至于实际上过了多少年，我也说不好。每次我从{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}中回来时，都会发现{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}中时间的流逝与亚空间中大相径庭。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey through the warp, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in realspace."

languages.text: «Desde el día de mi iniciación como acólito... de modo que décadas». {n}Heinrix se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Es difícil decir cuántos años han pasado exactamente. Cuando vuelvo de un viaje por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}, suelo descubrir que ha pasado mucho más o mucho menos tiempo en el {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Desde el día de mi iniciación como acólito... de modo que décadas». {n}Heinrix se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Es difícil decir cuántos años han pasado exactamente. Cuando vuelvo de un viaje por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}, suelo descubrir que ha pasado mucho más o mucho menos tiempo en el {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「アコライトとなった日からだから…数十年だな」{n}ハインリックスは肩をすくめる。{/n}「本当は何年経ったかはわからない。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の旅から戻ると、{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}ではもっと時間が経っていたり、あるいはあまり時間が経っていなかったりすることがよくあるものだ」
languages.original_text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「アコライトとなった日からだから…数十年だな」{n}ハインリックスは肩をすくめる。{/n}「本当は何年経ったかはわからない。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の旅から戻ると、{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}ではもっと時間が経っていたり、あるいはあまり時間が経っていなかったりすることがよくあるものだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Seit dem Tag meiner Weihung zum Akolythen — seit Jahrzehnten also." {n}Heinrix zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Es ist schwer zu sagen, wie viele Jahre das her ist. Wenn ich von einer Reise durch den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} zurückkehre, stelle ich oft fest, dass im {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g} sehr viel weniger Zeit vergangen ist."
languages.original_text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Seit dem Tag meiner Weihung zum Akolythen — seit Jahrzehnten also." {n}Heinrix zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Es ist schwer zu sagen, wie viele Jahre das her ist. Wenn ich von einer Reise durch den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} zurückkehre, stelle ich oft fest, dass im {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g} sehr viel weniger Zeit vergangen ist."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Depuis le jour de mon initiation en tant qu'acolyte, il y a plusieurs décennies. Combien d'années exactement, je ne saurais dire, {n}continue Heinrix en haussant les épaules.{/n} Quand je reviens d'un voyage dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, je me rends souvent compte qu'il s'est passé plus ou moins de temps dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis le jour de mon initiation en tant qu'acolyte, il y a plusieurs décennies. Combien d'années exactement, je ne saurais dire, {n}continue Heinrix en haussant les épaules.{/n} Quand je reviens d'un voyage dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, je me rends souvent compte qu'il s'est passé plus ou moins de temps dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Havarilere katıldığım günden bu yana... Yani uzun yıllarca." {n}Heinrix omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Sahi, kaç yıl olmuş acaba? Söylemesi zor. Ne zaman bir {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} seyahatinden dönsem... {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Gerçekuzayda{/g} çok daha fazla veya çok daha az zaman geçmiş oluyordu."
languages.original_text: "Since the day of my initiation as an acolyte — so, decades." {n}Heinrix shrugs.{/n} "How many real years it's been, it's hard to say. When I return from a journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}, I often discover that much more or much less time has passed in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Havarilere katıldığım günden bu yana... Yani uzun yıllarca." {n}Heinrix omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Sahi, kaç yıl olmuş acaba? Söylemesi zor. Ne zaman bir {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} seyahatinden dönsem... {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Gerçekuzayda{/g} çok daha fazla veya çok daha az zaman geçmiş oluyordu."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
